alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:18AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms moving through the Madison area... At 317 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from 11 miles south of Versailles to near Madison to 10 miles west of Bedford. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Hanover, Saluda, Smyrna, Milton, Brooksburg, Canaan, North Madison, Manville, and Belleview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
